title: Tuna and vegetable pasta bake
ingredients: ['225g penne pasta', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 large onion, chopped', '2 sticks celery, chopped', '1 red pepper, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', 'salt, to taste', 'ground black pepper, to taste', '4 tablespoons sherry', '225g kale, stems removed and leaves coarsely chopped', '1 (400g) tin potato and leek soup', '250ml vegetable stock', '1 (185g) tin tuna packed in water, drained', '115g grated mozzarella cheese', '40g herb seasoned breadcrumbs']
